title: looking for decent adc in bronze who wants to abuse ardent cancer.
body:
main soraka and sona along with others but would like to focus those as im pretty decent with them.

{{champion:16}} 
21.4 CS
5.06:1 KDA
1.7 / 3.8 / 17.7
63%
46 Played

{{champion:37}} 
20.5 CS
4.90:1 KDA
3.3 / 4.0 / 16.5
71%
41 Played






solo queue adc's to inconsistent 

looking for a trist/jinx/vayne/cait/kali or (anything else like that) adc main to abuse ardent censor while we still can and doesn't mind listening to me calling shots and can keep cool if were behind.

hit me up if you interested.

replies.body:
I'm currently Silver 4 in solo/duo and Bronze 1 in flex, however I'm just adjusting back into the game after a few months break, so my skill level is around that of a bronze 3.

 I used to main ADC in season 6 and earlier this year however stopped because I wasn't enjoying playing ADC in solo queue without a friend who could play support well and who I can communicate with through voice chat.

I am proficient with Ashe, Caitlyn, Ezreal, Jhin, Jinx, Lucian and Miss fortune and can play Kog'Maw, Sivir and Tristana moderately well.

I can play Friday nights and pretty much all of Sat and Sun. If you want I am willing to use Discord or Skype for voice chat. My ign is Miicka.

Sounds good

I quit support around the same time as i wasnt enjoying it as a solo player lol, but botlane just has to much impact on my mid/top games lately. If you cant beat em join em.
Added you on my main, will probably jump on a lower account and get some good practice in.
